What’s that all about?\""},{"lineNumber":246257,"originalJapaneseLine":"「残念ながら、原因は未だ不明。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Unfortunately, the cause remains unknown."},{"lineNumber":246258,"originalJapaneseLine":"　目下、調査中です」","translatedEnglishLine":"We are currently investigating.\""},{"lineNumber":246259,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ヘルマン内にある各地の砦や野営地が、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Various forts and camps scattered throughout Helman"},{"lineNumber":246260,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ほぼ戦闘が行われることなく","translatedEnglishLine":"have been occupied almost without any fighting,"},{"lineNumber":246261,"originalJapaneseLine":"　占領されている、とだけ」","translatedEnglishLine":"that’s all we know.\""},{"lineNumber":246262,"originalJapaneseLine":"「兵士は何してた？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What were the soldiers doing?\""},{"lineNumber":246263,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうやら……眠っていたようです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It seems... they were asleep.\""},{"lineNumber":246264,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんだとー！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha-what!? Those lazy fools deserve death! Death!\""},{"lineNumber":246265,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんなすっとこどっこい共は死刑だ死刑！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Those idiotic fools deserve death! believe.\""},{"lineNumber":246269,"originalJapaneseLine":"「集団睡眠、ということは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Collective sleep, you say... could it thought.\""},{"lineNumber":246272,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何か……魔人の特殊な魔法か力か……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Some sort of... special magic or power of a demon way...\""},{"lineNumber":246279,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":246280,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":246281,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマン平原――","translatedEnglishLine":"Helman Plains—"},{"lineNumber":246282,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス――","translatedEnglishLine":"Zeth—"},{"lineNumber":246283,"originalJapaneseLine":"前線にある砦の、見張り台に上った兵が","translatedEnglishLine":"A soldier climbed up the watchtower of a frontline fort"},{"lineNumber":246284,"originalJapaneseLine":"月に向かって大口を開けた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and opened his mouth wide toward the moon."},{"lineNumber":246285,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふわああああ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fuwaaaaah...\""},{"lineNumber":246286,"originalJapaneseLine":"くっ、眠い……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, so sleepy...\""},{"lineNumber":246287,"originalJapaneseLine":"滲んだ涙をぬぐうため目を擦りながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rubbing his eyes to wipe away the tears welling up,"},{"lineNumber":246288,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふと隣を見れば同じく見張りの兵が","translatedEnglishLine":"he glanced beside him to see another guard"},{"lineNumber":246289,"originalJapaneseLine":"ウトウトと船をこいでいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"nodding off and dozing lightly."},{"lineNumber":246290,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、こいつ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, this guy...\""},{"lineNumber":246291,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうすりゃ痛い目見ずに済む」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That way, you can avoid getting hurt."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ、馬鹿だな……
他の連中と同じように寝ていた方が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It would have been easier to just sleep like everyone else,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 楽に死ねたってのに」
「お、なんだなんだ？」
「眠り損なった奴がいたのか？
可哀想になぁ」
「あ、あ……お、お前ら、どこから……！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A-ah... y-you guys, where did you come from...!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぞろぞろと、次から次へと魔物兵が姿を見せる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One after another, demon soldiers appeared in succession.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はははっ！　どこからって、
入り口からに決まってるだろう！
皆、眠っているから簡単に入れたぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone was asleep, so we got in easily!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、起きている悪い子は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, the naughty ones who are awake...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 永久に眠りましょうねぇ〜」
「うわっ、うわぁあぁあああ〜〜〜〜！」
魔物隊長が剣を振り下ろした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon captain swung his sword downward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城――
総統司令部――
「報告です」
「ヘルマンにおいて、正体不明の力により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In Helman, due to an unknown force,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍にやすやすと占領される報告が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are reports of the demon army easily occupying positions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相次いでおります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are coming in one after another."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぁ〜？　なんだ、そりゃ」
「残念ながら、原因は未だ不明。
目下、調査中です」
「ヘルマン内にある各地の砦や野営地が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Various forts and camps scattered throughout Helman

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほぼ戦闘が行われることなく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have been occupied almost without any fighting,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 占領されている、とだけ」
「兵士は何してた？」
「どうやら……眠っていたようです」
「な、なんだとー！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wha-what!? Those lazy fools deserve death! Death!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなすっとこどっこい共は死刑だ死刑！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those idiotic fools deserve death! Death!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統、落ち着いて下さい。
どうやら何かの力による、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It appears they were put into a collective sleep by some sort of power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 集団睡眠にあったものと思われます」
「集団睡眠、ということは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Collective sleep, you say... could it be

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スリープの魔法か何か、でしょうか？」
「は、はい、私達参謀はその線を疑っています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes, we on the staff suspect that line of thought."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何か……魔人の特殊な魔法か力か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Some sort of... special magic or power of a demon lord..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とにかく、兵には注意するようにと伝えてますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In any case, we have told the soldiers to be on alert,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 原因が分からなければ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but if we do not understand the cause,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対策の取りようもなくて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there’s no way to counter it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「集団睡眠……
まさか、な……」
ヘルマン平原――
ゼス――
前線にある砦の、見張り台に上った兵が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A soldier climbed up the watchtower of a frontline fort

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 月に向かって大口を開けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and opened his mouth wide toward the moon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふわああああ……
くっ、眠い……」
滲んだ涙をぬぐうため目を擦りながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rubbing his eyes to wipe away the tears welling up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふと隣を見れば同じく見張りの兵が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he glanced beside him to see another guard

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウトウトと船をこいでいた。
「あ、こいつ……

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
